name: Argentina

description: Brazil's largest city, renowned for its cultural diversity, vibrant nightlife, and business district.

description: Known for its colonial architecture, Afro-Brazilian culture, and lively music and dance scene.

description: Famous for its stunning waterfalls straddling the border of Argentina and Brazil, offering breathtaking views and nature walks.
